title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7403.4 - Searches
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7403.4 - Searches

State Regulations

Upon admission to an OCFS secure facility, a search shall
be conducted to verify that no resident is in possession of contraband. A
search shall include, but is not limited to, a strip search. When lawful and
warranted, a body cavity search may be conducted pursuant to OCFS
regulations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7403.4

Renumbered from subtitle AA of chapter III
New

York State Register April 11, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 15, eff. 4/11/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
